li.label: cowardly
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} always shies away from danger. {PAWN_pronoun} is usually the first to flee from battle.

li.label: brave
li.description: Few things scare {PAWN_nameDef}. In battle {PAWN_pronoun} stands unfazed where others panic and flee.

li.label: fearless
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} laughs in the face of danger. Some ascribe it to bravery, others to stupidity. Either way, {PAWN_nameDef} seems to lack any sense of self-preservation and will never flee from a threatening situation.
